short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A collection of useful tools for Mastodon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a growing collection of enhancements for Mastodon, currently including the following features:

- Mastodon instance switcher: easily switch between multiple Mastodon instances to reply to posts and follow accounts
- Expanded quote post previews
- Tag browser: explore a larger portion of the fediverse when browsing tags
